meaningMnemonic: You’re <kanji>renew</kanji>ing something to become <kanji>new</kanji> again. We’re talking about a <vocabulary>renewal</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>update</vocabulary> to something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
